title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
40% newly developed industrial land in the SBIZ has been fully committed to applicant enterprises.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: 63 low-efficiency and highly polluting community heating boilers have been domolished

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: The district heating service area has expanded by 1.3 million m2 in Baiyin district from the 2006 baseline to benefit 10,000 households including 10% low-income families.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: A special heating assistance program has been put in operation before the full operation of the heating system constructed under the Project to ensure low-income families have access to the improved heating service.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: An urban road transport framework has been established in Baiyin and Pingchun districts to meet their long-term urban development needs up to 2030.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: Detailed action plans to enforce the national vehicle emission control regulation on the project-built roads have been developed by the concerned project implementing agencies and approved for implementation.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.

title.narrative: The EMS developed for the SBIZ has been adopted and put in full operation.

description.narrative: Facilitated economic transformation and improved quality of life in Baiyin City.
